alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:28PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PONTOTOC...UNION...NORTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA...NORTHERN LEE...SOUTHEASTERN TIPPAH AND PRENTISS COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keownville, or 10 miles west of Baldwyn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Booneville, New Albany, Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Ecru, Jumpertown, Thrashers, Keownville, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Burton, Wheeler, Blair, Pinedale, Sherman, Dumas, Marietta and Blue Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Itawamba; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tippah; Union
